resources.string: Automatically download attachments for incoming emails
Only download attachments when manually requested
Enter your (nick)name, how do you want to be addressed.
Transmasculine mode, we\'ll try not to make you dysphoric, and won\'t mention possibly triggering topics
Woman mode, we\'ll use traditional feminine terms.
Neutral mode, for non-binary, questioning and other users, who don\'t want to see gendered terms.
I recently started having periods and I\'m not thinking about getting pregnant. (version for minors, adults choose the last option)
I\'m in a relationship I can\'t get pregnant in./I can\'t physically get pregnant for some other reason.
I\'m a pre-T transguy(trans masculine-leaning person) planning on taking T someday.
I\'m in ftm transition at start of T/I microdose, and I want to track period dissapearing.
I\'m gnc/I simply don\'t like feminine aesthetics of similar apps.
I\'m trans in some way, but I don\'t plan on taking hrt.
I\'m a virgin or I live in celibate (no sex, whatever reason)
Choose your gender/mode, there will be more detailed modes on the next screen. You can always change these settings.
If you want to, enter your birthday, (you\'ll get birthday wishes). Advised if you\'re a minor, the age setting will change automatically.
Select one of the options below
